data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Critics of Almodovar's early work have not thoroughly considered his revolutionary style. While ____ criticize ____ flamboyant ____, ____ fail ____ note ____ it ____ this ____ quality ____ makes ____ so ____. In fact, less colorful and dramatic scenes would render his work boring and drab, a feature of far too many other directors.
data.partBlankContent: Critics of Almodovar's early work have not thoroughly considered his revolutionary style. While th__ criticize h__ flamboyant cinemat_______, th__ fail t_ note th__ it i_ this ve__ quality wh___ makes i_ so diff_____. In fact, less colorful and dramatic scenes would render his work boring and drab, a feature of far too many other directors.
data.fullContent: Critics of Almodovar's early work have not thoroughly considered his revolutionary style. While they criticize his flamboyant cinematography, they fail to note that it is this very quality which makes it so different. In fact, less colorful and dramatic scenes would render his work boring and drab, a feature of far too many other directors.
data.answer: 阿莫多瓦早期作品的批评家们并没有充分考虑他的改革性的风格。当他们批评他华丽的摄影技术时，他们没有注意到正是这种品质使他如此与众不同。事实上，缺乏丰富多彩的、戏剧性的场景会使他的工作变得枯燥乏味，这是其他很多导演的一个特点。
